data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30441, Version Hash: 5cef09fafbb46c3d0b505fcc3a1864a062681741
data.actual_result: The expiration text at the bottom changes to "... after 1 use."
data.expected_result: The expiration text at the bottom shouldn't change.
data.short_description: After cancelling a max invite use change, the expire text changes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start creating an instant invite to a server. - Click "Edit invite link". - Set the invite to expire after one use, but don't generate a new link. - Click "Cancel".
